root.name: Midway Arcade Origins
root.description: OverviewBackbone Entertainment developed this compilation of 30+ Midway arcade games for release by Warner Bros., which currently controls the Midway library. The release includes a total of 31 games, all of which are "remastered" in high definition.Games IncludedThe following games were confirmed in conjunction with the game's announcement in September 2012:720APBArch RivalsBubblesChampionship SprintCyberball 2072DefenderStargate (listed as "Defender II" to avoid copyright issues with the science fiction franchise)GauntletGauntlet IIJoustJoust 2Marble MadnessPit-FighterRampageRampartRobotron 2084Root Beer TapperSatan's HollowSinistarSmash TVSpy HunterSpy Hunter IISuper Off-RoadSuper SprintToobin'Total CarnageVindicators Part IIWizard of WorXenophobeXybotsGames which have supported local multiplayer in the past do so on this compilation, with an inclusion of online leaderboards as well.
